PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1996-15941996-10-240,  ,  TB,  , 
PrecisAmendments to the GOVERNMENT CONTRACTS REGULATIONS which lower the monetary threshold on non-competitive contracts from $30,000 to $25,000, specifically exempt any Interchange Canada Agreement from the rules and update the reference to "appropriate Minister".
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1996-0472 Publication Date: 1996-11-13
